Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory30.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Soldier A', 3: "Whew... It's over, eh?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'After taking out all the attackers, the group blanks out for a moment, collectively forgetting what they had been doing before the battle began.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Camu', 3: 'What are you people doing? Start collecting our things!', 4: '2'}
{3: "Camu's squad is sent on a new mission to transport some packages for Kurono."}
{3: 'Like their supplies, the items are sent to them via airdrop. The packages are heavily bundled up and come with small filters, perhaps for secrecy or other reasons.'}
{3: "While receiving their shipment, Camu's squad is attacked by a Corrupted horde."}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Oh, yeah... Come help, everyone...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'As the other members come back to their senses and are about to help with the supplies, a scream rings out right next to Camu.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1DisableSlow'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1601.jpg'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Ahhhhhhhh!'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Hey! What's wrong?"}
{3: 'The screams increase in volume. The soldier is lying face-down on the ground, scratching at his own arms and neck.'}
{3: 'His face turns purple. As if suffocating, he starts struggling to pull off his protective gear in attempt to breathe better.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Stop! Taking off your gear here? Are you off your rocker?'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Ahhhhh! It hurts... And so itchy...'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Aaaaaaaahhhh!'}
{3: 'The squad members surround the screamer, trying to figure out what is going on, while Camu keeps shaking him in hopes of keeping him calm.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Where are you hurting? Were you injured in the battle? Or are you sick?'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Aaaahhhh! I don't know... don't know, Camu!"}
{3: 'His whole body is in pain and drastically weakened. It is as if lava is churning in his brain.'}
{3: 'The man manages to spit out a few words as he writhes on the ground. Camu touches his body and senses a strong heat radiating from his skin.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Oh, right... the serum! Someone fetch the serum!'}
{2: 'Soldier A', 3: 'Got it! Give him a shot now!'}
{3: "Some other members had already gone off to fetch the serum before Camu's shout, as this is not the first time something like this has happened."}
{3: 'Though they have no idea what the reason is, squad members would sometimes suddenly fall down in excruciating pain and lose all control over their limbs.'}
{3: 'Kurono\'s response to situations like this is always: "More serum."'}
{3: 'But the official solution did not seem to work this time. They give the soldier the shot, but things do not take a turn for the better.'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: 'Camu... Camu...'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'What?'}
{2: 'Soldier', 3: "Ugh... we... we're real unlucky, huh..."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Hey, what do you mean? His vitals are—Hey! Hey! Wake up!'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Dammit!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory40.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: 'According to the contract they signed, all bodies of squad members must be returned to Kurono. Along with the delivery, Camu brings his dead squadmate there.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "I'm here to make a delivery... yet you won't even let me into the city?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "It's part of the contract. Don't try to force your way in, or we'll shoot.", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Camu is held up at the gate while his "packages" are brought into the city right away.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "Yeah, I know you'll shoot. Anyway, what's happened to this dude? If you guys want the body, it means you'll give him an autopsy, right?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: "I said don't move!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: "What's happening?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Camu notices that the guards are on high alert—not because of the contractual obligations, but a sort of instinctive reaction.'}
{3: 'With every step Camu takes towards the guard, he takes one step back and clutches his weapon tighter.'}
{3: 'It was the same when they took in the body. Those people seemed disproportionately nervous, as if Camu was handing over an explosive.'}
{2: 'Camu', 3: 'Tell me what you know.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Clenching his fist, Camu marches towards the guards, who immediately open fire without bothering to issue a warning according to the rules.'}
{2: 'Guard', 3: 'Dammit! Told you to stay back!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Camu knows better than to cause a scene here, so he gives up his questioning attempt and backs up, finally fleeing the city amidst gunfire.'}
{3: 'What happened to his squadmate? And what do the Kurono guards know?'}
{3: 'What will happen to him and the other squad members?'}
{3: "The questions still plague Camu's mind."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory38.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "Meanwhile, a man stands on the city's lookout platform. He watches the retreating figure and presses a button on his communications device."}
{2: 'Mao Zhen', 3: 'Mao Zhen speaking. The "monsters" have left the city.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mao Zhen', 3: 'It\'s only been a short time since these models have been employed in operations before the "accidental" deaths began. I\'m truly regretful.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mao Zhen', 3: 'And the deaths have become increasingly frequent. Our "monsters" might not have much time left.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mao Zhen', 3: 'So we should just go ahead without any ado, huh? Got it. How about we send them to "that place", then?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mao Zhen', 3: "Yes. As a member of the Special Security Department, I'll handle this.", 4: '1'}
